title: Tower lazer glitch
body: This has happened to me a few times in game I see and enemy get targeted by a tower then the tower continues to track them with the laser  even when they are in jungle and in a way it makes it slightly unfair for them. just wondering what causes this glitch

replies.body: I feel like all of you just had a bad moment in internet connection.

Minion animations of ranged creeps bugs out sometime too and launch projectiles off into forest notifying you of where jungler has walked into sight - seen lazer do it a few times too. (Red line shooting off through forest).
I got lasered by the inhib turrets at wolves -.- it was stupid

I should also make it clear the tower won't shoot it jus lets the laser
 follow them
Just as a note, it only targets them if they are in vision for the enemy team (from all the times I've seen it.)
It's happened to me. I thought it was pretty funny.
